description:
These lightweight trail shoes are waterproof and stable, to keep your adventures easy-going regardless of the weather. Get all-weather traction with their Vibram® soles and extend your walking comfort with impact technology that reduces stress as you move over rock, hardpack and rough ground.

  • Uppers are durable suede with polyester mesh inserts for increased breathability
  • GORE-TEX Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable construction
  • Tongue lining features stretch GORE-TEX, for waterproofness with outstanding fit and comfort
  • Structured toe boxes with abrasion-resistant toe rands
  • Arch suspension in the insole
  • Midsoles are dual-density, compression-moulded EVA
  • Activ Impact Technology uses materials to absorb impact and ground shock
  • Outsoles are Vibram Dynatech 3 for long lasting traction
name: Scarpa Moraine Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
